content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was aiming for a higher price, and I felt that we had already reached a fair price. Further negotiations might lead to disappointment.
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you give that rating?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I gave that rating because Mr. Schmidt was respectful, clear in his communication, and showed a willingness to negotiate, which are all qualities that contribute to a positive negotiation experience.
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
